text: Dunstan (909â€“May 19, 988) was the Archbishop of Canterbury from 960 to 988. He was canonized (made a saint) in 1029. He became famous for the many stories told about his dealing with the Devil. ==References== == Other websites == *Early British Kingdoms: St. Dunstan *Catholic Encyclopedia: St. Dunstan *The True Legend of St. Dunstan and the Devil by Edward G. Flight, illustrated by George Cruikshank, published in 1871, and available from Project Gutenberg *Early British Kingdoms: St. Dunstan enshrined at Glastonbury or Canterbury?
